INSERT INTO permissions(name) SELECT 'DASHBOARD_GENERAL_INFO' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM permissions WHERE name = 'DASHBOARD_GENERAL_INFO');
INSERT INTO roles_permissions(role_id, permission_id) SELECT r.id, p.id FROM roles r, permissions p where r.name in ('ADMIN') AND p.name in ('DASHBOARD_GENERAL_INFO') AND NOT EXISTS(Select * from roles_permissions rp where r.id = rp.role_id AND p.id = rp.permission_id);
